sentences.sContent: The local paper featured me standing on a stepladder with a caption, "Wendy climbs the ladder to success."
sentences.sCn: 当地的报纸刊登了一幅我站在活梯上的特写，下面写着：“温迪登上了成功之梯。”

sentences.sContent: ...The most striking feature is the caption under the picture...

synos.tran: [语][计][图情]标题；字幕；说明；逮捕

remMethod.val: cap(覆盖) ＋ tion → 盖在上面的东西 → 说明文字， (电影)字幕

trans.tranOther: words printed above or below a picture in a book or newspaper or on a television screen to explain what the picture is showing
